name: Pixel Boom
description:
Get to the rope and pull it. The thing is that dynamite is tied to this rope! When you pull the rope, the dynamite falls. Blow up all the zombies with it - just push it towards the zombies and you're done!

Controls:

W or Up Arrow - to jump

A or Left Arrow - to go left

D or Right Arrow - to go right

The game was made for Trijam #189 in 2 hours 45 minutes!

Some sprites were made before the game, some during. Enjoy!
